message.body: you really took the piss out of me moaning about a dead chat service! i'm still somewhat new so i don't know the regulars
side effect of easily cloned sites: everyone gets splintered and scattered apart
its funny how sites that were abandoned years ago will still propogate. that's kind of the point, and its cool but it's also cluttering in a way. lots of abandoned blogs and projects
all networks outside of the www have had the same problems though, it is not only 0net. and 0net is still pretty much a baby.
i've no idea what others do online. i don't even know what i do online. besides live chat rooms, which unfortunately is not 0net's forte, but this still kind of works.
zerochatrooms doesn't list the most active chatroom, which is thunderwave.bit !
